cu.explanation_en: Setting DRB ciphering to an invalid enum value will cause ciphering configuration errors and prevent secure data transmission.

du.explanation_en: Setting downlink frequency band to a negative value (-1) will cause frequency configuration errors and prevent proper downlink transmission.
du.explanation_zh: 將下行鏈路頻率頻帶設定為負值 (-1)，會導致頻率配置錯誤，並阻止正確的下行鏈路傳輸。
